web_snippets: Zooko Wilcox-O'Hearn is an American Colorado-based computer security specialist, self-proclaimed cypherpunk, and ex-CEO of the Electric Coin Company (ECC), ...
Zooko is a long-serving technologist and entrepreneur. His experience spans open, decentralized systems; cryptography; information security; and startups.
Zooko has more than 20 years of experience in open, decentralized systems, cryptography and information security, and startups.
